name: Minecraft 1.19
description: The “Wild Update” is the name given to the release of version 1.19 on June 7th, 2022. The update introduces a variety of new content including: brand-new locations, materials, and blocks such as the Deep Dark and Mangrove biomes; ancient cities; mobs like the warden, the frog, the tadpole, and the allay, as well as new items obtainable only in these new biomes.
